question: Analyze the technology adoption trends across companies in the healthcare industry to identify leading technologies and service providers.

subtasks.task: Filter companies in the healthcare industry to gather insights on their technology stacks and adoption patterns.
Collect data on technology adoption by these companies, including details on specific technologies and the associated service providers.
Analyze service contracts and vendor relationships to identify leading service providers in the healthcare technology sector.
Summarize and categorize the identified technologies to understand which are most actively adopted or emerging in the healthcare industry.
